name: Apocalypse (itch) (LootKitStudios, WeirdBeardDev, Johnathan Feezy)
description:
Apocalypse is a 2D shoot-em-up, where only one finger is needed. It was started in February and is still in an early prototype phase. The goal is mobile deployment, any feedback is welcome and appreciated.

Controls:

- Click and drag the joystick to drive the tank

- Stand still to shoot

Survive as long as you can!
